node.doctext: The [id://56883] keep the [id://17989|chatterbox] troll free. They're able to shut someone out of the chatterbox who is being excessively offensive and disruptive. This is called [id://539865|borg]ing a user. A list of all currently borg'ed users can be seen in the [id://56087] node.
node.title: About the Power Users Group
